title: Riders Halt Étoile de Bessèges, Lidl-Trek, Red Bull and EF Abandon in Protest Over Safety Concerns
content:
Riders at the Etoile de Bessèges stopped racing early Friday in protest of race conditions, a day after a car turned head-on into the peloton.

Read the full article at Riders Halt Étoile de Bessèges, Lidl-Trek, Red Bull and EF Abandon in Protest Over Safety Concerns on Velo.
